title: Spiritual & Cultural Significance of a Nose Piercing on the Right Side

steps.title: Your life is about to be filled with good fortune.
steps.content: Your life is about to be filled with good fortune. Piercing the right side of your nose is said to attract good luck and wealth. The universe might draw fortune to you. Your piercing can also mean that your ambition and drive are finally producing the fruits of your labor. [1] X Research source

steps.title: New beginnings are coming your way.
steps.content: New beginnings are coming your way. A nose piercing on the right side of your nose could be an important reminder to welcome new changes. Although change can be scary, it can bring new opportunities and good fortune. [2] X Research source Your piercing tells you to have confidence that everything will work out right in the end.

steps.title: You have high self-esteem.
steps.content: You have high self-esteem. A nose piercing on the right side is believed to show self-confidence. You know who you are, what you believe, and what you stand for. Your piercing can also indicate that you’re confident in your spirituality and you’re willing to take risks when it matters. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Your intuition will be heightened.
steps.content: Your intuition will be heightened. Your new piercing could be a sign of heightened inner intuition. By getting your nose pierced on the right side, it is believed that you have the ability to access parts of your brain that are less analytical and more spiritual, connecting you to a higher world. Speak your truth and the universe will amplify your voice. [4] X Research source

steps.title: You’ve got the motivation to achieve success.
steps.content: You’ve got the motivation to achieve success. A right-side nose piercing could signify that you’re willing to do whatever it takes to achieve your goals. When you stay consistent and motivated, your hard work pays off in the end. [5] X Research source

steps.title: You feel a spiritual bond with your life companion.
steps.content: You feel a spiritual bond with your life companion. Piercing the right side of your nose is said to open new pathways to heavenly powers that might bring you closer to finding your soul mate and discovering true love. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Nose piercings are a large part of Hindu spirituality.
steps.content: Nose piercings are a large part of Hindu spirituality. According to Indian culture, nose piercings symbolize womanhood and elegance. Due to the piercing’s association with the Hindu goddess of marriage, Pavarti, it’s popular for women to pierce their noses before their wedding. Although in most states in India, women choose to pierce the left side of the nose, some women in Southern Indian states choose to pierce the right side instead. [7] X Research source According to Hinduist beliefs, the right side of the body is believed to be the masculine side and represents logic and rationality. Piercing the right side is said to help increase the power of a person’s rational thinking and decision-making.

steps.title: A right side nose piercing may indicate sexual orientation.
steps.content: A right side nose piercing may indicate sexual orientation. Even though piercings do not accurately represent a person’s sexual orientation, some believe that the right or left side can indicate if a person is lesbian or gay. [8] X Research source However, these claims are not backed up by science, and concrete information about exactly which side is which has been lost over time. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Piercing your nose on the right side can express your unique taste in fashion.
steps.content: Piercing your nose on the right side can express your unique taste in fashion. Nose-piercing has been practiced for thousands of years, but in Western culture today, nose piercings are often only used as a fashion statement. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Nope, you can choose whichever side you’d like!
steps.content: Nope, you can choose whichever side you’d like! There are no right or wrong sides to nose piercings; it's all about how you’d like to look and which side of your face you want to show off more. If you’re not sure, you can use a glue-on gem or a clip-on piercing to see if you like having a nose ring on that side. When deciding which side would be best for you to pierce, think about what you do on a day-to-day basis. If you’re right-handed, it may be easier for you to take out and clean a piercing on the right side of your nose. Also, think about your normal sleeping position—sleeping on your right side when you have a right-side nose piercing might be uncomfortable and disrupt the healing process. [11] X Research source If you have a beauty mark, freckles, tattoos, scars, or other piercings, consider balancing them out by adding the piercing to the opposite side of your face. Your hairstyle can be another important factor. If your hair covers or flows towards one side of your face, consider balancing out your look by putting the piercing on the other side. You can also choose the side of your face you angle toward the camera when you take selfies.

steps.title: If you’re interested in piercing meanings, there’s more to explore.
steps.content: If you’re interested in piercing meanings, there’s more to explore. A right-side nose piercing is just one of many piercings. Check out the spiritual and cultural significance of these other piercings types: Left-side nose piercing : Tied to femininity, vitality, and protection against bad luck. In Ayurvedic medicine, a left nostril piercing is believed to aid cramps and PMS. Left ear piercing : Signifies uniqueness, creativity, and self-expression. In the 1980s, some men pierced their left ear to signal that they were straight. Septum piercing : Represents self-expression, uniqueness, and rebellion. Spiritually, it’s said to help you communicate with the divine.
